name: Barbara Warren
temple_description: Barbara Warren, the Blood Countess, is a paladin from the shattered lands of Abyssoria, wielding a scythe made of moonstone. Her presence inspires allies and terrifies foes with her divine might.

active_skills.name: Divine Slash
active_skills.effect: 30% chance to cause bleeding for 2 rounds

active_skills.name: Sacred Barrier
active_skills.effect: Grants shield absorbing 15% of max HP for 2 rounds

active_skills.name: Retribution Strike
active_skills.effect: Reflects 10% of damage received for 1 round
